content:
KUALA LUMPUR (March 26): Omesti Bhd said on Tuesday that its wholly-owned subsidiary Omesti Holdings Bhd had disposed of 3.47% of its shares in Microlink Solution Bhd for RM18.55 million, resulting in its shareholding in the group declining to 32.95%.

The disposal has raised gross proceeds of RM18.55 mil
